keyMoments.title: Victory in Davy Back Fight
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hat Pirates win the Davy Back Fight against the Foxy Pirates, with Luffy defeating Foxy in the final combat round.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's strength and unity, ending with no permanent losses to their roster.

keyMoments.title: Crew Reunited
keyMoments.description: Chopper and Robin are reclaimed from the Foxy Pirates, reuniting the full Straw Hat crew.
keyMoments.significance: Restores the crew to their complete roster after the Davy Back Fight challenges.

keyMoments.title: Departure from Long Ring Long Land
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hat Pirates leave Long Ring Long Land to continue their quest to find a shipwright.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the end of the Long Ring Long Land Arc and progression toward Water 7.

keyMoments.title: First Loss in Davy Back Fight
keyMoments.description: The Foxy Pirates suffer their first loss in a Davy Back Fight, with Captain Foxy defeated by Luffy. Their 920-game winning streak comes to an end.
keyMoments.significance: Marks a historic moment for the crew, witnessing their captain's first defeat after 920 consecutive victories.
